Name: VataZombie
About the game: In the game you have to fight for your independence, in front of an army of cotton zombies. Your task is to keep 20 waves of zombies and prevent them from killing you. This game was made by a man who suffered from the Russian invasion of Ukraine, but he did not give up and released his game. The proceeds from the game will go to the affected people who lost their homes and jobs due to the war. By buying the game you will not only support the author of the game, but also help people in need of help. The amount of donation will be 10% of the developer's profit.
Meta Title: VataZombie: Dec 8, 2022, Klim and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on VataZombie? Check out the release date (Dec 8, 2022), developer insights from Klim, and a complete game summary.
